channel.title: All Registered Polls for the National Assembly

item.title: Opinion Poll by Ninamedia, 11–13 December 2018 – Seat Projections for the Parties
item.description:
• Slovenska demokratska stranka: 22–29 seats
  • Lista Marjana Šarca: 14–20 seats
  • Socialni demokrati: 14–19 seats
  • Stranka modernega centra: 0–5 seats
  • Levica: 7–12 seats

  • Stranka Alenke Bratušek: 0–4 seats
  • Demokratična stranka upokojencev Slovenije: 0–5 seats
  • Slovenska nacionalna stranka: 0–4 seats
